title: Island Kitchens*, Granite-like Counter Tops
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 624 Sq.
The Preserve at City Center puts you in the center of it all.
If you are searching for an apartment for rent in the Denver Metro area, look no further than our community of attractive, newly remodeled homes.

The Preserve at City Center is perfectly located in Aurora just off I-225 and Mississippi Avenue, a few blocks away from Town Center at Aurora, Buckley Air Force Base, Children's Hospital and minutes to Downtown Denver, DTC and DIA.
Discover the perks of a great location , from a range of entertainment options to a variety of delicious dining spots just a perfect mix of active outdoor recreation and an urban lifestyle.
The Preserve at City Center gives you convenient access to everywhere you need to be!
You'll find a complete selection of shops, grocery stores, services and dining within minutes.
Several schools are nearby to serve those residents with families and easy access to RTD bus lines connecting you directly to the Park n Ride or Denver light rail stations.
If you are looking for apartments for rent, make The Preserve at City Center your new home.
Situated within this park-like setting you will find four different floor plans to choose from consisting of one and two bedroom apartment homes.

The Preserve at City Center is a comfortable community with a full range of newly renovated apartment homes which feature faux wood flooring , well-equipped modern kitchens with black or stainless appliances and designer light fixtures and faucets.
Residents are steps away from the swimming pool, 24 hour fitness center, parks and bike trails making it an ideal retreat to enjoy life's simple pleasures.
Come home to quiet, carefree living at The Preserve at City Center Apartment Homes.
The Preserve at City Center welcomes your pets with a small deposit.
Please note some breed restrictions apply.
We invite you to visit our community or to view photos and floor plans of our community.
Contact us to schedule your personal tour today!
- Conveniently located between DTC and Downtown Denver
- Minutes from Buckley Air Force Base
- Easy Access to RTD, Parks, and Trails
- Walking distance to Cafes, Restaurants, and more
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
